string.name: internet_permission_reason
string.value: 需要网络权限来访问后端API

string.name: network_info_permission_reason
string.value: 需要读取网络状态以适配不同的网络环境

string.name: read_media_permission_reason
string.value: 需要读取媒体库以展示用户的图片与视频

string.name: write_media_permission_reason
string.value: 需要保存生成的图片或视频到媒体库

string.name: read_image_video_permission_reason
string.value: 需要读取图像与视频以供内容上传

string.name: write_image_video_permission_reason
string.value: 需要写入图像与视频文件到本地图库

string.name: camera_permission_reason
string.value: 需要相机权限以拍摄菜品或聊天照片

string.name: notification_permission_reason
string.value: 需要通知权限以接收新订单和新消息提醒

string.name: vibrate_permission_reason
string.value: 需要震动权限以进行通知提醒
